name: InverseProportion
description:
this game was made for GMTKGameJam 2021. and It is platformer game which can change Inverse Proportion Relationship of Elements of Game.

JumpPower, Speed, Size, FallSpeed, HP, BlockSize etc.. can change.

if the variables are same color, you can control variable to Mouse Move. 

please play by full screen.

Thanks for everyone who play it.

if you discover bug, you can download pc version Release.zip
